name: streamifier
description: Converts a Buffer/String to a readable stream
readme: streamifier =========== _Node.js project_ #### Converts a Buffer/String to a Readable stream #### Version: 0.0.2 #### Installation #### ``` npm install streamifier ``` #### Functions #### - [_module_.createReadStream(buffer[, options]) : Readable](#createReadStream) --- ___module_.createReadStream(buffer[, options]) : Readable__ Returns a Readable stream. The `buffer` parameter can be a String or a Buffer. The `options` are the same as the [Readable](http://nodejs.org/api/stream.html#stream_new_stream_readable_options) stream.
